items.headline: Michael Burry’s latest AI criticism is on depreciation. What it’s all about.
items.summary_en: Michael Burry, the hedge-fund manager of “The Big Short” fame who is betting against two of the stock market’s favorite AI plays, is back with a new criticism of valuations in the sector.

items.headline: Visa, Mastercard reach new settlement with merchants. Will it shake up credit-card rewards?
